history.proof: intros A' B' a b H1 H2. intros. qsimpl time: 2 use: join. qsimpl time: 2 use: join. split. - qsimpl time: 2 use: join. apply List.nth. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - qsimpl time: 2 use: join. qsimpl time: 2 use: join. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros A B a b H1 H2.
intros A' B a b H1 H2.

ctx: intros A' B' a b H1 H2.
intros A' B' a b H1 H2.
intros A' B' a b H1 H2.
intros A' B' a b H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment B : Type A : Type R_A : Relation A R_B : Relation B Join_A : Join A Join_B : Join B A' : A B' : B a : increasing A' b : increasing B' H2 : A H4 : B H0 : A H3 : B X0 : Prop H1 : join A' H2 H0 H5 : join B' H4 H3 X1 : Prop Unable to unify "join A' H2 H0" with "(R_A @@1)%signature (H2, H4) (H0, H3)".

exceptions.exn: In environment B : Type A : Type R_A : Relation A R_B : Relation B Join_A : Join A Join_B : Join B A' : A B' : B a : increasing A' b : increasing B' H2 : A H4 : B H0 : A H3 : B X0 : Prop H1 : join A' H2 H0 H5 : join B' H4 H3 X1 : Prop Unable to unify "A" with "(R_B @@2)%signature (H2, H4) (H0, H3)".

ctx: intros A' B' a b H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment B : Type A : Type R_A : Relation A R_B : Relation B Join_A : Join A Join_B : Join B A' : A B' : B a : increasing A' b : increasing B' H2 : A H4 : B H0 : A H3 : B X0 : Prop H1 : join A' H2 H0 H5 : join B' H4 H3 X1, X2 : Prop Unable to unify "A" with "(R_B @@2)%signature (H2, H4) (H0, H3)".

original: intros A B a b H1 H2. unfold increasing. intros n n' H3. unfold join in H3. destruct H3. split. - apply H1. apply H. auto. - apply H2. apply H0. auto.
